posts.extended: Edit: Thanks for pointing typos and mistakes, I’ll update the article as noted. Discussion in HackerNews and Reddit. The following is inspired by the article “It’s the future” from Circle CI. You can read the original here.

posts.description: How being alone may be the key to rest - BBC News
posts.extended: How much rest do we think we need, who is getting the most, and what are the most restful activities? The results of the world's largest survey on rest indicate that to feel truly rested, a lot of us want to be alone.

posts.description: Hillary Clinton weighs in on the Kim Kardashian robbery
